Params: Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory756.jpg
At long last, the townspeople drove all of the Hetero-Creatures away, and the Forsaken that had tried to breach the town have all been eliminated.
Most of the buildings in town survived the attack, with only a few having been damaged.
Strange Resident A
I just need the tavern to still be around by the end of it... it's all I need to live on!
Strange Resident B
****! Do you even know what's coming out of your mouth?! My wheat... they're all gone with the fire!
The wheat fields outside out of town are now a sea of fire, having been set aflame by the Hetero-Creatures.
Max
Lucky that we were done gathering most of the wheat... and as for what's gone...
Says Max as he walks up to the burned field and picks up a handful of ashes that's still warm.
Max
These ashes will turn into richer soil and bring us an even greater harvest next year...
Max
And that's just like this town—you lose some but you gain some, and everything will eventually spring back to life.
Max tidies up his blood-stained jacket and walks up to Vera and the Purifying Force.
Max
We really owe all of you a big one...
Vera
Likewise. There is no way we would have been able to stop them without all your help.
Issarius
Right... Agree.
With a knowing smile, Vera looks at Max.
Vera
But if you really want to thank us, we'll gladly take this bartender back to Babylonia with us.
Max
What a choice. This is the best bartender we have in town.
Strange Resident A
And the only one, too. Hahaha!
Max
But... guess this bartender of ours does deserve to go further than beyond this town.
Vera
We have a deal, then. Question is... where is this bartender in question here?
Vera looks around, remembering still seeing the "bartender" giving out commands toward the end of the fight.
Right then, out of a corner comes No. 21's shout.
No. 21
Captain! I... I can barely hear the commandant's heartbeat now!
Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory748.jpg
Vera
Out of my way now...!
Vera makes her way through the crowd in a panic. She has no choice but to go ahead with an examination in the tavern, for want of a proper medical environment.
Old Lady
You've got to save this good soul, Missy...
Strange Resident A
Yes, you gotta save this good soul! I mean, it's not like I know how it's done or anything...
Strange Resident B
Vera
Jesus, get these people out for me already, Issarius!

Issarius doesn't like the idea of taking an order from Vera but does the bidding anyway after a moment's hesitation and kicks all the lookie-loos out of the tavern with the other Purifying Force members.
No. 21
Captain... what's going to happen to Commandant?
Vera
That Nigel is one hell of a man... This is worse than I thought.
Vera
Gray Raven Commandant... can you still hear me?
(Nod)
You manage to keep yourself awake but can't say a word.
The world as you see it starts growing blurry, to the point you can barely make out Vera's words anymore.
Vera
He's connected with Noctis... and when Noctis feels despair, it rubs off on the Gray Raven Commandant here, which speeds up the spread of the poison.
Vera
Just what's up with that idiot?!
Vera
What did you say...
Trying to pick up your words, No. 21 straightens her Inver-Device.
No. 21
Commandant... wants to perform a Deep M.I.N.D. connection with Noctis.
Vera
Are you trying to kill yourself...?! Your consciousness will be bound to his if you do that... and you're dead meat if he weakens.
He... needs... me...
Vera
Hmph... so you're choosing to trust him here, huh? The guy might not be the smartest of apples, but he's got a will as strong as iron. That much I'll give him.
Sighing with a wry smile, Vera has made up her mind.
Vera
Well, let's give it a try, then... and see what sort of miracle you two can bring about.
